name: Mongolian Beef Noodles
description: Ground beef and linguine coated in a savory and slightly sweet Mongolian-style sauce.
instructions: Cook Pasta: Cook linguine according to package directions. Drain and set aside.
Brown Beef: Brown ground beef in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Drain excess fat.
Add Aromatics/Sauce: Add minced garlic to beef, cook 1 minute until fragrant. Stir in soy sauce, beef broth, brown sugar, hoisin sauce, ground ginger, black pepper, and red pepper flakes.
Thicken Sauce: Mix cornstarch and cold water until smooth. Stir into the skillet. Bring to a gentle boil, stirring, until sauce thickens slightly.
Combine: Add cooked linguine to the skillet. Toss well to coat noodles with the sauce. Simmer together for 2-3 minutes.
Garnish & Serve: Sprinkle with sliced green onions and serve immediately.
